author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-668. java: Using a map in an exception type will generate a class that does not implement Comperable-> that will generate a stub that does not compile
The compiler was incorrectly assuming that exceptions were comparable. Now, exceptions are treated just like structs.
